K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i bhatta ra ka sya pradzny'a buddhi barbha na n'a ma dha ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-3: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-4: blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-5: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-6: na mo manydzu shr'i ye ku m'a ra bhu t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-8: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-10: sho dha ni bi sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-11: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-12: aa ma le bi ma le dza ya ba ti ru ru tsa le h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-13: gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-16: lan gcig bklags na bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-17: bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-18: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:471b-19: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:472a-1: gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:472a-2: gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:472a-3: nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:472a-4: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-029:472a-5: blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
